Hijas 3.0 (Age of Sigmar) [1,995pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Daughters of Khaine) [1,995pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

    • Leader [955pts]

      • Bloodwrack Shrine [190pts]

        Selections: 1. Bathed in Blood, 2. Rune of Ulgu, 5. Mindrazor, Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, General, Goadstaves, Tail of Serpents, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders, Whisperclaw, Wounds Suffered

        Categories: AELF, ORDER, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, MELUSAI, HERO, WIZARD, BLOODWRACK MEDUSA, BLOODWRACK SHRINE, Leader, Behemoth, TOTEM, MELUSAI HERO, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Rune of Ulgu, Bloodwrack Shrine Wound Track: 00-03, 04-06, 07-10, 11+, Command Trait: Bathed in Blood, Magic: Bloodwrack Shrine, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Enfeebling Foe, Mindrazor, Mystic Shield, Unit: Bloodwrack Shrine, Unit Abilities: Aura of Agony, Bladed Impact, Bloodwrack Stare, Weapon: Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, Goadstaves, Tail of Serpents, Whisperclaw


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Rune of Ulgu The bearer knows one additional spell from the Lore of Shadows.

        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Bathed in Blood Add 1 to this general's Wounds characteristic. In addition, at the start of your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this general.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Bloodwrack Shrine 1/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Enfeebling Foe
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Enfeebling Foe 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mindrazor 818"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 18" of the caster. Improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's melee weapons by 1 until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that unit's melee weapons if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Bloodwrack Shrine *1385+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Aura of Agony At the start of your hero phase, you can roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 7" of this model. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Aura of Agony value shown on this model’s damage table, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. The same unit cannot be affected by this ability more than once per turn.
        Bladed Impact After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Bloodwrack Stare Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with this model’s Bloodwrack Stare. Instead, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models from the target unit that are in range of the attack. For each 5+, the target unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Hag Queen [105pts]

        Selections: 1. Catechism of Murder, Blade of Khaine, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: AELF, HERO, PRIEST, HAG QUEEN, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Prayer: Catechism of Murder, Rune of Khaine, Touch of Death, Unit: Hag Queen, Unit Abilities: Priestess of Khaine, Witchbrew, Weapon: Blade of Khaine


        Prayer DescriptionAnswer ValueRange
        Catechism of Murder If this prayers is answered, pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 14" of this model. Until your next hero phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by that unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.314"
        Rune of Khaine If answered, pick 1 of the chanter’s melee weapons (it cannot be a weapon used by a mount). Until your next hero phase, that melee weapon has a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of the value shown in its profile.3-
        Touch of Death If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range 1 and visible to the chanter. Then, take a dice and hide it in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick one of your hands. If they pick the one holding the dice, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.33"
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Hag Queen 6"585+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Priestess of Khaine In your hero phase, this model can chant 1 prayer. If it does so, pick 1 of the prayers and make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+, the prayer is answered.
        Witchbrew At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 12" of this model to drink witchbrew. If you do so, roll a dice, adding 1 to the roll for each of the following abilities that this model has gained:

        • Headlong Fury
        • Zealot’s Rage
        • Slaughterer’s Strength

        On a 5+, you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, on a 5+, do not take battleshock tests for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Blade of Khaine Melee1"43+3+-11

      • Morathi-Khaine [240pts]

        Selections: 5. Mindrazor, Bladed Wings, Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine), Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: AELF, HERO, WIZARD, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, MORATHI-KHAINE, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Command Abilities: Worship Through Bloodshed, Magic: Magic, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Black Horror of Ulgu, Mindrazor, Mystic Shield, Unit: Morathi-Khaine, Unit Abilities: Commanding Presence, One Soul, Two Bodies, Weapon: Bladed Wings, Heartrender (Morathi-Khaine)


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Worship Through Bloodshed If this model is on the battlefield, you can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do, pick 1 other friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 24" of this model. That unit can shoot or, if it is within 3" of any enemy units, it can fight. You cannot use this command ability more than once in the same phase.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Magic 3/2. Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model.Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Black Horror of Ulgu
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Black Horror of Ulgu 736"Pick 1 enemy unit within range of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. On a 1, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 2-3, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 4+, it suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mindrazor 818"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 18" of the caster. Improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's melee weapons by 1 until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that unit's melee weapons if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Morathi-Khaine 6"684+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Commanding Presence Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model.
        One Soul, Two Bodies If the Shadow Queen is on the battlefield, wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to this model are instead allocated to the Shadow Queen and have no effect on this model. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to the Shadow Queen in this way cannot be negated.

        In addition, if the Shadow Queen is on the battlefield and an ability or spell would cause this model to be slain without any wounds being allocated, then this model is not slain and 3 wounds are allocated to the Shadow Queen.

        If the Shadow Queen is slain, after her model is removed from play, this model is also slain.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Bladed Wings Melee2"63+3+-11
        Heartrender (Morathi-Khaine) Melee2"33+3+-1D3

      • The Shadow Queen [420pts]

        Selections: Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (The Shadow Queen), Wounds Suffered

        Categories: AELF, HERO, THE SHADOW QUEEN, MONSTER, WIZARD, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, Behemoth

        Battalion Abilities: Two Bodies, One Soul, Morathi Wound Track: 00-03, 04-06, 07-08, 09-10, 11+, Unit: The Shadow Queen, Unit Abilities: Fly, Fury of the Shadow Queen, Iron Heart of Khaine, Weapon: Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (The Shadow Queen)


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Two Bodies, One Soul If this model is on the battlefield, wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to Morathi-Khaine are instead allocated to this model and have no effect on Morathi-Khaine. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model in this way cannot be negated.

        In addition, if this model is on the battlefield and an ability or spell would cause Morathi-Khaine to be slain without any wounds being allocated, then Morathi-Khaine is not slain and 3 wounds are allocated to this model.

        If this model is slain, after this model is removed from play, Morathi-Khaine is also slain.
        Morathi Wound Track MoveHeartrenderEnvenomed Tail
        00-03 14"86
        04-06 12"75
        07-08 10"64
        09-10 8"53
        11+ 6"42
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        The Shadow Queen *12104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Fury of the Shadow Queen While this model is within 3" of any enemy models, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHINERAI HARPIES and MELUSAI units wholly within 18" of this model.
        Iron Heart of Khaine No more than 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds can be suffered by this model in the same turn. Once 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds have been allocated to this model in the same turn, not counting any wounds that were negated, any further wounds and mortal wounds that would be allocated to this model are ignored and have no effect.

        Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model at the start of the battle round count towards the number of wounds allocated to this model in the first turn of that battle round. Wounds and mortal wounds allocated to this model at the end of the battle round count towards the number of wounds allocated to this model in the second turn of that battle round.

        If the rule for an ability or spell would cause this model to be slain without any wounds being allocated, 3 wounds are allocated to this model instead. These wounds cannot be negated but will still be ignored once 3 wounds and/or mortal wounds have been allocated to this model.

        Wounds allocated to this model cannot be healed
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage

        Gaze of Morathi Missile18"12+2+-3D6

      • Sisters of Slaughter [270pts]

        Selections: 20 Sisters of Slaughter [135pts], Barbed Whip, Bladed Bucklers, Hornblower, Reinforced [135pts], Standard Bearer

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, SISTERS OF SLAUGHTER, Battleline, Reinforced

        Unit: Sisters of Slaughter, Unit Abilities: Bladed Bucklers, Dance of Death, Handmaiden, Horn Blower, Standard Bearer, Weapon: Barbed Whip


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Sisters of Slaughter 6"176+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Bladed Bucklers Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target a unit armed with Bladed Bucklers. In addition, if the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit armed with Bladed Bucklers is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Dance of Death This unit is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and it can move an extra 3" when it piles in.
        Handmaiden 1 model in this unit can be a Handmaiden. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Horn Blower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Units that include any Hornblowers can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for units that include any Standard Bearers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Barbed Whip Melee2"23+4+-1

    • Other [95pts]

      • Khinerai Heartrenders [95pts]

        Selections: 5 Khinerai Heartrenders [95pts], Barbed Javelin

        Categories: DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, KHINERAI HARPIES, KHINERAI HEARTRENDERS, ORDER, Other

        Unit: Khinerai Heartrenders, Unit Abilities: Death From Above, Descend to Battle, Fire and Flight, Fly, Heartpiercer Shield, Shryke, Weapon: Barbed Javelin (Melee), Barbed Javelin (Missile)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Khinerai Heartrenders 14"176+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Death From Above This unit can run and still shoot later in the same turn. In addition, improve the Rend characteristic of this unit's Barbed Javelins by 1 if this unit was set up on the battlefield in the same turn.
        Descend to Battle Instead of setting up this unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say it is circling high above as a reserve unit. If you do so, at the end of your movement phase, you can set up this unit on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units. At the start of the fourth battle round, any models that are still in reserve are slain.
        Fire and Flight In your shooting phase, after this unit shoots, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, this unit can make a normal move of 6" (it cannot retreat or run).
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Heartpiercer Shield Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit. In addition, if the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Shryke The leader of this unit is a Shryke. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's weapons.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Barbed Javelin (Melee) Melee2"14+4+-11
        Barbed Javelin (Missile) Missile12"13+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Blood Rites, Fanatical Faith


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges.

        1. Quickening Bloodlust: You can re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit.

        2. Headlong Fury: You can re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit.

        3. Zealot's Rage: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, friendly AVATARS OF KHAINE are automatically Animated (see the model’s warscroll).

        4. Slaughterer's Strength: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit.

        5. Unquenchable Fervour: Worsen the Rend characteristic of weapons that target this unit by 1, to a minimum of ‘-’. In addition, do not take battleshock tests for this unit.
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Beast Master

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Beast Master


        Grand Strategy Description
        Beast Master When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any MONSTERS from your starting army on the battlefield.

    • Malign Sorcery [55pts]

      • Invocation of Khaine: Heart of Fury [55pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Prayer: Summoning, Unit Abilities: Locus of the Murder God


        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription
        Summoning 312If answered, set up this invocation wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Only DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIESTS can attempt to summon this invocation.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Locus of the Murder God At the start of the combat phase, if this invocation is on the battlefield, its commanding player must roll a dice. On a 1-5, until the end of that phase, subtract 1 from the damage inflicted (to a minimum of 1) by each successful attack that targets a DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 12" of this invocation. On a 6, until the end of that phase, subtract 1 from the damage inflicted (to a minimum of 1) by each successful attack that targets a DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit wholly within 12" of this invocation and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units wholly within 12" of this invocation; then, this invocation is removed from play at the end of that phase.
